original_text: And when Joshua and all Israel saw that the ambush had captured the city, and that the smoke of the city went up, then they turned back and struck down the men of Ai.
korean_text: 여호수아와 온 이스라엘이 그 복병이 성읍을 점령함과 성읍에 연기가 오름을 보고 다시 돌이켜 아이 사람들을 쳐죽이고

sentences.original_text: And when Joshua and all Israel saw
that the ambush had captured the city
and that the smoke of the city went up
and struck down the men of Ai
